def_cn: 处于困境的;危机四伏的;问题缠身的
def_en: If you describe a person, group, or organization as embattled, you mean that they are having a lot of problems or difficulties.

def_cn: . 卷入战争的;（尤指）被敌军包围的
def_en: An embattled area is one that is involved in the fighting in a war, especially one that is surrounded by enemy forces
